summary: This module defines automated tests for the DeepFloyd IF inpainting super‑resolution pipeline, covering both quick unit checks with dummy components and a comprehensive integration test. The tests validate forward passes, attention slicing, batch inference consistency, model serialization across formats, and compatibility with optimized attention mechanisms on GPU devices.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, performance, and deployability of the inpainting super‑resolution pipeline, enabling reliable image editing services and supporting efficient hardware acceleration.
